title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: In sports, the Doosan Bears are now a win away from their sixth South Korean baseball championship.On Friday, the Bears defeated the Kiwoom Heroes by five runs to zero in Game 3 of the Korean Series at Gocheok Sky Dome in Seoul.That win means the Bears have won the first three games in the best-of-seven Korea Baseball Organization championship series.The Bears will face the Heroes again on Saturday afternoon.. knowing a win in that match will secure their first Korean Series title since 2016.No team has rallied from a 3-0 Korean Series deficit to win the championship in KBO history.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
